import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{loginUser}from'../redux/slices/authSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{error,status}=useSelector(state=>state.auth);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();dispatch(loginUser({email,password}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),status==='failed'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error})]});};export default LoginForm;
